OSM infrastructure data used in creation of transport infrastructure data packs.

Source: R/data.R
sotm_data.Rd

OSM infrastructure data used in creation of transport infrastructure data packs.

sotm_data

Format

A data frame with 11,741 features described by 34 variables.

Source

generate_example_data.R

Examples

library(sf)
sotm_data   # Lazy Loading. Data becomes visible as soon as it is requested. 
#> Simple feature collection with 11741 features and 33 fields
